Dragging and Dropping

Copying Items

You can use the mouse to drag and drop items in order to copy projects, folders, and versioned items. However to copy project databases, you must use the Menu bar.

To copy items using drag and drop, select the items you want to copy. If copying to the same project database, hold the CTRL key and click and drag the items into the destination. If copying to a different project database, click and drag the items into the destination.

Moving Versioned Files

To move versioned files using drag and drop, select the items you want to move and then click and drag the items to the destination project or project database. You cannot move items from one project database to another; use copy and delete instead.
